name: HyperBowl Tokyo
description:
Bowl the streets of Tokyo! In the sixth and final of the original HyperBowl lanes, dodge traffic and roll through the bright lights of Ginza!

Swipe up along the screen to push the bowling ball forward, left and right to roll horizontally, down to push the ball back. Pinch to pause.

Tip: longer swipes impart more force.

Join us on Facebook at http://hyperbowl.rocks/.for the latest news.

If you enjoy this lane, check out the full HyperBowl app featuring all of the original and new lanes!

Localization assistance from Raymond Chow (Chinese), Veronique Gauthier (French), and Ian Schwabe (Dutch).

Built with the original HyperBowl art and sound assets licensed from Absolute Certainty, the Unity game engine from Unity Technologies, MacXWare Font Library, the iTween library from pixelplacement and Lean Localization Package from Carlos Wilkes.

HyperBowl is a registered trademark of Absolute Certainty Inc.
